description: An item acquired by defeating Scar in Somnoire.
bgDescription:
"I harbor no desire to become your adversary or bring about any destruction.
I want to make it clear that annihilation is not my aim. It is not a matter of anyone's desires, but an inevitable conclusion.
Simply embrace it. You will come to realize that resistance is futile."
obtainDescription: An item acquired by defeating Scar in Somnoire.
